posts.post_content:
Hello,
I am looking for many T206 cards. I prefer the commons backs, as I do not want to pay a premium for tougher backs. I am looking for cards with nice eye-appeal in the EX range or better. However I will accept nice looking cards with small problems, small crease, paper loss, etc.. Its all about eye appeal, centering is not important. I am looking for raw or graded. Below is my want list feel free to email me with one card for sale or multiple. Email: [url]bucklercards@yahoo.com[/url]. I would prefer to pay with Paypal.
